Articles.Content:
First off, i apologize for posting about a mission, since most of you have probably already done this, but for some reason for me, this has been more challenging then landing on other planets.

Finally, I have landed on both the Mun and Minmus in one mission!

Rocket standing by launch tower, pre-launch

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34621[/ATTACH]

Retroburning in proximity of Minmus landing sight

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34622[/ATTACH]

Landed on Minmus!

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34624[/ATTACH]

Headed for the Mun

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34625[/ATTACH]

In Munar Orbit

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34626[/ATTACH]

Gah! can only upload 5 files...

Landed on the Mun!

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34627[/ATTACH]

Realized I had enough fuel to at least orbit Minmus again

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34628[/ATTACH]

Aaaand got another Mun intercept on the way home

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34629[/ATTACH]

Hurtling through the atmosphere

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34630[/ATTACH]

Success!

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34631[/ATTACH]
Great. Next step: doing the same with Ike and Duna. Ready? Go!

nonsense...

do it with all bodies of the Joolian system

Not so difficult as one might think, the most delta V is expended getting there and a VTOL capable space plane will get on to laythe and off with little fuss, then land it backwards on the other moons and fire toward kebin and glide in at KSC
youre more than welcome to do it and take pics/video of it :-)
